title: Server crash?
body: Currently 20 minutes into my final ranked placement on the enemy nexus (team score 21-10) and game crashed? my duo partner also crashed at the same time. Internet working fine, unable to reconnect? what is happening

replies.body: sorry but my network is working fine, this game is now still in progress after 1 hour, no one in the game can connect to it or spectate it. 3rd party websites show the game is still going. Issue is most definitely on Riot's side

Thanks for posting - we're taking a look to see if there's a problem server side.

Cheers
Mindstar
game is now an hour and a half  still in progress, none of the 10 players can connect. Very poor given it is in the last of my ranked placement matches

Looks like there were issues on a couple of our game servers, and this is why only a small group of players are affected.

We're bringing the servers back online at the moment and this will hopefully get rid of the stuck games.

hello there,

i am experiencing the same problem. my game is still in progress for almost 2 hours!

Hey there,

Right now the game server is currently up as shown on the service status page [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) I haven't played all day, however checking now I can definitely join a queue without issue.

It's possible you're experiencing network related issues, take a look at the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for help with those.

Hope this helps,
Seph
was 6 minutes in my Rank , cant reconnect for like 15 minutes - i am keep on trying
